title: LFP Silver or Gold Group
body:
Hey guys, I am looking for a small group to play some fun blind and flex games with and even find some other games that we all enjoy. If you're interested in joining a new group then this post is for you. 

If yes, add bjosh on OCE league and we'll have some great times. 

Can't wait x

replies.body: hey dude, May I join in ur small group for playing together?  If u want to play together, please add my game friend "Poikilobottle".
